sentences.sContent: Patients in whom no orthotic was used were encouraged to ambulate immediately following randomization, maintaining "neutral spinal alignment" for 8 weeks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Patients in whom no orthotic was used were encouraged to ambulate immediately following randomization, maintaining "neutral spinal alignment" for 8 weeks.
sentences.sCn: 随机分组后，不使用矫形器组的病人即刻被鼓励行走，保持脊椎中立位8周。

words.tran: 流动的；走动的；非固定的
走动的，流动的；可走动的
[车辆][医] 救护车；战时流动医院

trans.tranOther: to wander about or move from one place to another
